entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Creek 10:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm near the Alberta border. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the American border in the morning and early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
